building.history: St. John Paul & St. John XXIII are named after the two Popes. These halls opened in 2014, the same year these two Popes were canonized.
building.located: Left wing of the new building

building.history: Sta. Ana Hall is named after the location which Sta. Ana Avenue, Davao City where the school was erected.
building.located: Right wing of the new building

building.history: Mabutas Hall is named after Archbishop Antonio Ll. Mabutas, DD, JCD, the second Archbishop of the Archdiocese of Davao.
building.located: Right wing of the new building

building.history: Capalla Hall is named after Archbishop Fernando Robles Capalla, DD, the third Archbishop of the Archdiocese of Davao and was designated as the corporate president of HCDC on November 28,19996.
building.located: Back view of Palma Gill Hall; near Gym area

building.history: Gmeiner Hall is named after Prof. Hermann Gmeiner, founder of SOS kinderdorf International and one of HCDC's prime benefactors.
building.located: Gray building, Chapel and Main Library Area

building.history: Thibault Hall is named after Archbishop Clovis Joseph Thibault, PME, the first Apostolic Administrator and Bishop of Davao.
